entry.summary: The describe-load-balancers command in AWS CLI returns details of a specific or all the load balancers for a given account. Read more in this guide.

entry.title: How to use the “delete-stack” command in AWS CLI?
entry.summary: The delete-stack command removes a specific stack in a particular region via AWS CLI. It accepts various optional parameters as shown in this guide.

entry.title: How to use the “describe-regions” command in AWS CLI?
entry.summary: The describe-regions command in AWS CLI lists all or enabled regions for a given account. To list EC2 regions, use the “aws ec2 describe-regions” command.

entry.title: How to Setup Wine on Debian 12
entry.summary: You can install Wine on Debian 12 by downloading the GPG key, adding the source repository, updating the Debian repository and installing it via apt command.

entry.title: How to Set Static IP Address on Debian 12
entry.summary: You can set static IP address on Debian 12 from terminal or GUI. For terminal, use interfaces file or nmcli utility, while for GUI, use Network settings.

entry.title: How to Remove Duplicate Lines in Vim
entry.summary: To remove the duplicate lines in Vim use the sort -u command unless you want to modify the file. To remove duplicate lines without modifying the file use the awk command.

entry.title: How to List Installed Packages on Debian 12
entry.summary: You can list installed packages on Debian 12 from apt list, dpkg-query commands and snap package manager. For more details, follow this guide.

entry.title: How to Install Steam on Debian 12 Bookworm
entry.summary: You can install Steam on Debian 12 from Debian repository, Deb package, Steam repository, Snap Store or Flatpak. For more details, read this guide.

entry.title: How to Install Samba on Debian 12: A Step-by-Step Guide
entry.summary: You can install Samba on Debian 12 directly from the apt install command and can set up quickly to allow file sharing from one system to another.

entry.title: How to Edit Columns in Vim
entry.summary: To edit columns get into visual block mode, select columns, press shift+i to insert new text, and press Esc.

entry.title: How to Install Python on Debian 12
entry.summary: You can install Python on Debian 12 from the source tgz file or through pyenv. Read this article to find a detailed step-by-step guide for these methods.

entry.title: How to Highlight the Current Line in Vim
entry.summary: To highlight the current line use :set cursorline command and to highlight the column use :set cursorcolumn command.

entry.title: How to Get CPU Info in Linux
entry.summary: The CPU is known as the brain of a computer system since the entire OS relies on it. To fetch CPU details, multiple command-line tools are available.

entry.title: How to Get Ingress Using “kubectl get ingress”
entry.summary: To get ingress, use the “kubectl get ingress” command. To get ingress details in any format, use the “kubectl get ingress -o ” command.

entry.title: How to Delete Ingress Using “kubectl delete” Command?
entry.summary: To remove the ingress, use the “kubectl delete ingress ” command. To remove all the ingresses, use the “kubectl delete --all ingress” command.

entry.title: How to Create Ingress in Kubernetes
entry.summary: To create Ingress, run the Ingress controller. Then, create the “ingress.yml” file, define the routing rules, and use the “kubectl apply -f ” command.
